title: Limits on transactions with affiliates, executive
context: §412:9-407 Limits on transactions with affiliates, executive officers, directors or principal shareholders. No depository financial services loan company shall make any loan and extension of credit or engage in any transaction in violation of section 18j of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, 12 U.S.C. §1828(j) or sections 22(g), 22(h), 23A or 23B of the Federal Reserve Act, 12 U.S.C. §§375a, 375b, 371c and 371c-1. [L 1993, c 350, pt of §1]
